headline.main: Afghan Official: 5 Local Policemen Killed in Taliban Attack
headline.print_headline: Afghan Official: 5 Local Policemen Killed in Taliban Attack

lead_paragraph: At least five members of the Afghan security forces were killed early Sunday morning when their checkpoint came under an insurgent attack in northeastern Kunduz province, an Afghan official said.
snippet: At least five members of the Afghan security forces were killed early Sunday morning when their checkpoint came under an insurgent attack in northeastern Kunduz province, an Afghan official said....
